review: Dr. Karishma is extremely experienced, friendly *** ************* doctor. I feel blessed to have come across her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had been struggling with bladder control since a very young age. I had gone from countless pediatricians to countless gynecologists and urologists explaining my symptoms, to no end. I used to have a burning sensation on peeing every time and sometimes it would get so bad that I would bleed from my urethra. I would be inside an emergency room howling with pain every 3 months. I would explain my symptoms endlessly to the on-call doctors the follow-up Gynecologist or the urologist in the OPD the next day, just to be told that my symptoms were not that severe and I must have had early period spotting. I was always handed a pack of antibiotics for Urinary Tract Infection (UTI) and pain medication and sent on my way. I had really lost my faith in medical science for women to the point I would go to the emergency room and never go for the follow-up OPD as I knew exactly what I would be prescribed - an overly strong anti-biotic and pain meds followed by "drink cranberry juice or have cranberry supplements". I discovered so much medication for myself on my own by reading on the internet and started experimenting and trying to increase my pain threshold. Until one day I came across Dr. Karishma's profile and I decided to get on a video consultation with her. She did not dismiss my pain. She did not dismiss my claim to have blood in my urine or coming from my urethra. She was the first doctor to believe me and she told me that I maybe don't have UTI in the first place and maybe this is a bigger problem. she called me in for a physical examination and for the first time it was informed to me to get to the root of my problem I diagnostic procedure called cystoscopy will have to be performed. I underwent the cystoscopy which she herself performed on me. she took care of me after the procedure to ensure I was not in any kind of pain. And after that, she gave me the diagnosis that I had been searching for my entire life - interstitial cystitis. It is a chronic disease of the bladder which causes UTI-like symptoms but is not UTI. She started my treatment course. And ever since I walked into her office, I have not had to see the insides of an emergency room again. it has been 11 months. She has helped me greatly with my condition. I do not have to live in fear of peeing anymore. I can finally pee pain-free all thanks to her. and my bladder has not bled once since I met her.  She is a brilliant urogynecologist, the smartest doctor I have met in my life, and the friendliest and most caring person. She will move her schedule around her patients' needs. She will listen patiently and without any judgment. She even helped me with my extremely painful period cramps due to PCOS, which would render me bed-ridden for many days. She has been the best thing to happen to me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Urinary Tract Infection (Uti), Pelvic Inflammatory Disease- PID,
review: Dr. Karishma has given me a new life when o was completely disappointed with consulting so many doctors and no diagnosis. While at one time I had to go for urination every hour with pain and discomfort I have now gained full bladder control and relieved of pain. Now going out or travel is not an issue. She is very intelligent, compassionate and explains the issue in a lot of detail. She has been a source of God to heal me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
For the past three years, my family and I have been searching for a good doctor who could help us identify and understand my mother's underlying health issue. 

From our very first meeting with Dr. Tharani, she astutely recognized and explained the root cause of my mother's health problem. Her ability to identify the issue accurately gave us the confidence that we were in the right hands. Dr. Tharani's patience, focus, and willingness to share every minute detail with us kept us well-informed throughout the entire process.

Thanks to Dr. Tharani's exceptional diagnostic skills, my mother received an accurate diagnosis. We are incredibly grateful to her for not only identifying the problem but also for guiding us through the appropriate procedures and treatment options. Her expertise and thoroughness have been instrumental in my mother's overall well-being.

Dr. Tharani's compassionate care and empathetic nature have made a significant impact on our experience. She genuinely listens to our concerns, addresses our questions, and ensures that we fully understand the medical decisions being made. Her dedication to providing personalized and attentive care has brought immense comfort to our family during this challenging time.

We cannot thank Dr. Tharani enough for her exceptional skills, professionalism, and the level of care she has extended to my mother. Her expertise and guidance have made a tremendous difference in our lives. We highly recommend Dr. to anyone seeking a dedicated *** ************* doctor who goes above and beyond for their patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr. Karishma in Delhi from the US. I was facing difficulty in urination. Symptoms were a very slow stream, frequent use of toilet (every hour) and frequent cases of UTI. After spending 2 years with top urologists in the US, my problem did not resolve. I was told this would stay for lifetime and the only way was to do self catheterization.

I reached out to Dr. Karishma via Practo for an opinion. I liked her approach very much that I decided to visit Delhi for treatment. She was very systematic in diagnosing the problem. She explained to me all possible causes of high urinary retention and started ruling out reasons one at a time, by running the necessary tests like Uroflowmetry, Urodynamics, MCU. She was super patient in answering my many questions. Her explanations were logical and she made it easy to understand and follow along why certain tests are needed and the treatment that would follow. The root cause was found to be a urethral stricture. This was unexpected for a person of young age like me especially given that I had no history of any surgery or childbirth. Dr. Karishma led the cystoscopy and surgery to remove the stricture. During my entire stay, she involved other doctors from her team as well to get a second opinion as needed. I did my visits at Sama Hospital, the staff at hospital was very cooperative and  supportive which made my visits very comfortable. 

Dr. Karishma fixed my problem 100%. The flow of urine stream improved drastically!  
Instead of going to the toilet 12-13 times a day, I went to the toilet 4-5 times a day like a person with a normal bladder. I never had to do self catheterization on a daily basis like what the doctors in the US had recommended. Since I don’t have to use the toilet frequently, I am able to do day to day activities without having to worry about being around the toilet every hour whether it is at a restaurant, a place outside home, the office, the parks, etc. Getting treatment from Dr. Karishma has been a huge blessing for me. I am highly thankful and grateful to her for bringing my life back to normal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I can't thank Dr. Karishma enough. So here goes my story. In July, 2020, I experienced burning sensation while passing urine. I consulted a doctor & was prescribed with antibiotics. I took two courses of antibiotics. The burning sensation left but the pain & tenderness never went away. Further, I consulted several doctors (including specialists) who diagnosed me with UTI (even though my urine reports were coming normal). I was prescribed with antibiotics, antifungals & cranberry syrup. However, I didn't find any relief. I kept asking doctors if I have Bladder Pain Syndrome but didn't get any satisfactory answer. With each passing day my misery & anxiety kept on increasing. Then one day I randomly searched for Urogynaecologists on Google & came across Dr. Karishma. I read the feedbacks on the Practo app & could relate with many patients who had similar problem like mine. In the first visit itself, Dr. Karishma told me what was going wrong with my body & explained everything very calmly to me & my parents. She did a cystoscopy to confirm my condition & I was diagnosed with Bladder Pain Syndrome / Interstitial Cystitis. Then she started my treatment which included strict diet, bladder instillations, pelvic floor physiotherapy (very important part) apart from oral medications. Two months down the treatment I would say I am in a much better condition. During each visit, Dr. Karishma fills me with so much positivity & she has always guided me very well. The best part about her is that she is extremely sincere & dedicated towards her work & she's very punctual. She has a very positive & friendly attitude towards her patients because of which I didn't hesitate in asking her any questions. If anyone has any bladder related issues, I would highly recommend them to consult Dr. Karishma who not only identified my problem but has also given me with solutions. Thank you Dr. Karishma. :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I was having urine burning issue from about 10 years and few episodes of urine retention also. After numerous short term treatments with various urologists and gynaechologists, one doctor reffered me to Dr. karishma, who is uro gynaechologist.  Before this I was not even aware that there is uro gynaechology also. She is one of the most patient doctors that I have ever met.  The first time she spoke to me on call,before even consultation and gave me handsome 15mins to calm me down. At my first visit she spoke to me for 1 hour and took down entire history of my problem. She asked even for the tiniest details which even I couldn't remember. She understood my problem well and explained everything to me well. She explained me what was my problem, what could be the plausible cause, what will be the line off treatment and how long the treatment will have to continue. I was diagnosed with urethera stenosis which she establsihed with cystoscopy. This was fixed by urinary cathetrization for 15 days followed by bladder instillations , physiotherapies and diet modifications. My treatment went for about 3 months and all the while she remained very supportive. Even when I broke down in the intial 15 days (which were most difficult part of the treatment), she supported me on call late night also.She builds faith with the patient and is always available for whatever help may be needed. Today after 3months of treatment with her, I am a much better person with no urinary problems at all.  I recommend Dr. Karishma to all those women who keep on having repeated and unexplained urinary problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am a 52year old working women,a teacher .since last 3 years I was suffering from acute pain while urinating in lower region. Went to numerous doctors and often diagnosed and given vaginal dryness meds or given meds for menopause problem. later I took homeopathic as well as ayurveda meds too as there was no relief. My whole life was an acute pain throughout the day. My confidence n quality of life deteriorated. It was only recently I was referred by a doctor frd n I came to Dr. Karishma. She listened to my problem and said that I was suffering from interstitial cystitis,  a bladder problem.She explained to me in great detail as to what was happening to my body. She told me to do cystoscopy so that extend of my bladder distress could be diagnosed.  I had my cystoscopy  and diagnosed with very bad bladder condition.  Meds  started n presently I am in so much better condition. I have my regular instillations.Now I can travel without any tensions. I know my problem will take time but I am satisfied that I am in good hands. Dr.Karishma is so patient  n for every meeting she fills me up with so much positivity  that I feel relaxed . She is so friendly and understanding that it's easier to discuss things with her regarding any of my medical issues. I would be more happy if She is able to somehow advertise her expertise field so that more people are aware of this problem and know how to address it with the right doctor . It was only after coming to this clinic I met and saw patients  with similar problem  and realized that my my medical was not unique .Dr. Karishma had treated and cured lots of patients.I am still undergoing treatment and feel lot of improvement. Thanks to Dr. Karishma.to

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I Aminder Preet(43years) was suffering from Uterine Prolapse & frequent urination problem. I met many doctors but didn’t get any satisfactory relief. One of my friend recommended Dr Karishma. I met her in July 2019 for the first time. She listened to my problems patiently & then she explained me about my problem in detail & also the line of treatment. She convinced me in such a manner that it was very easy for me to take decision about hysterectomy. Hysterectomy at this was a nightmare for me but she explained each & every aspect in detail & in very general terms then I didn’t take much time to decide. She is one doctor who takes all necessary steps to avoid any risk for example she not only helped me to improve my HB  & Iron levels but also treated my inflamed bladder by instillations. Not only in terms of treatment she is a great moral & emotional support. Just after a month I met Dr Karishma there was a sudden shock in my life as in the month of August my husband had to undergo brain surgery which was very critical, my life was shattered & I was not able to think or take care about my problem there Dr Karishma was a great emotional support & guided me & finally in the month of November Dr Karishma& Dr Hegde did my hysterectomy. Dr. Karishma helped me to recover fast with help of physiotherapy. She is a wonderful person & she came like an angle in my life as now I feel much healthy & better. My life is back on track. I strongly recommended Dr Karishma T if someone is facing this problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had hysterectomy and after the surgery, I was not able to pass urine. I was on catheter after the surgery for 7 days. After catheter was removed, I developed UTI. I had 3 courses of antibiotics, but my UTI never went away. I used to find it difficult to pee. My Gynaecologist referred me to a urologist. Both doctors were not able to understand the problem and my misery and anxiety kept on increasing. They claimed that I don’t have any problem and that I am unnecessary anxious. They started giving me anti anxiety medicines. 

After one month of suffering, I found Dr Karishma profile on Practo. I visited her and in my first visit she heard me patiently and empathised with me. She did a very detailed study of my case. She understood by problem and assured me that I need not worry and that she can cure me completely. She started with the treatment and I was much better within 1st week of her treatment. Within one month of treatment, she cured me completely. She had been an angel for me. I really thank her from the bottom of my heart to help me and many patients like me. May god bless her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife was suffering from Burning sensation for last almost 20 years. Burning sensation used to come very frequently. I visited many doctors to know the cause of the problem. but never got any satisfactory answer from any doctor. she always used to get blood traces in urine culture test and doctors used to say it is because of UTI. My was suffered a lot because of this issue. In june 2021 my niece suggested me to visit Dr. Karishma's clinic. I went to CUP, Sadiq Nagar to meet Dr. Karishma. In the first meeting itself dr. told that her issues is not UTI but some problem in the urine bladder. Dr. started treatment for the same. Dr performed cystoscopy on june 2021 and found the real cause the problem. The treatment went for almost 6 months. Dr suggested proper diet too. Now my wife is not having any issue. Dr Karishma is very helpful, punctual and friendly. Patients can call her any time. She taught so many things to my wife. Because of Dr. Karishma my wife is living normal life now.          I am so  thankful to Dr Karishma. Thank you so much madam. Keep on providing best treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was experiencing problems of severe burning sensation and pain while passing urine every once in a while and the frequency of such problems increased over the last 8 years. It was accompanied with painful lower abdomen cramps as well and blood with urine a few times. Whenever I reported the issue to any gynaecologist or nephrologist or any other doctor, they diagnosed me with chronic UTI even when the urine culture reports were clean 90% of the times. I had tons of antibiotics through all these years degrading my overall experience uski tu of life and health. I was panicking all the time and as suggested by the doctors, stopped travelling, panicked at the thought of using public washrooms, started thinking of sexual activity as one of the causes and avoided physical closeness altogether. It was Dr. Karishma who diagnosed the problem, had a detailed first session of almost more than an hour where she patiently listened to everything and gave me hopes of recovery after explaining in detail what her diagnosis was and what the treatment would entail. She was God sent and turned my life around. 

I followed the diet modifications and medication she gave me, bladder instillations as suggested and then cystoscopy. No complications at all.  After almost 8-9 years of my life I had an entire year without any episodes of pain or burning or any other symptom and I cannot thank her enough for this.

I am still seeing her for follow up treatments and just sitting down and talking to her in itself is a healing process.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: When I went to Dr Karishma I was at the lowest point of my life. I had been going to the best doctors all over India including Mumbai and Chennai for the last 15 years and had been through innumerable tests  and examinations with no avail. I will still struggling with chronic and embarrassing urinary symptoms for which the doctors could not find any explanation. I had already been through 4 cystoscopies, cystograms and several invasive tests. My confidence was zero and I had no life.  I broke down when I started telling Dr Karishma my symptoms.   This was my starting point with her. She started by first assuring me that all issues were curable and she was there to help me. She did a detailed study of my history, went through each and every report for the past 15 years and understood my issues in depth. She systematically went through all my health problems and started addressing them one by one.  I started visiting her every week for physiotherapy and taking the medication and following her advice to the T.  She assured me that there was nothing majorly wrong which also helped me to cope. With every passing week, I started feeling better, in fact there was a huge improvement in the first week itself.  Most of all, she treated me with so much dignity and respect that I had never got from any other doctor. I am much better now, in fact I feel I have got my life back. She has also been very satisfied with my progress. I highly recommend Dr Karishma for any urogynocological issues and I cannot thank her enough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Hi This is me Seema Rehman.
I had been in a lot of trouble for many years because of my urine problems. In the beginning, I couldn't understand the problem had met enough doctors even though. The doctors from Meerut kept doing the treatment but, unfortunately, I didn't feel so better as I should  have been.  I went to the Ayurvedic Treatment also for some months but that just didn't work. My condition was almost same. Actually, to be honest I was not getting my problem even the doctors I think were not getting what the problem was? I was sad really. The reports used to be normal. ***** * **** ** *** ***** ******** ******* ** **** *** ******* ****** * *** **** ******* ****** ********** **** *** ***** * ****** **** *** ******** I was sad because I had wasted many years in getting the treatments done. Finally, when even DR. Subhash Yadav ******** ****** ** ******* ** gave the address of DR. KARISHMA THARIANI in the end of September 2019. As soon as he gave me the address I got fixed an appointment. Then, I met DR. Karishma Thariani. She gave me a lot of time and also she could understand my problem. Although, it was the very first day i met she treated me ***** I was so satisfied indeed feeling happy.
Moreover, she just told me everything about the way of the treatment would be done. For me the best thing was she is a lady doctor. I could have shared my problems with her well without feeling hesitated. She usually behaves very well with every patient. 
Just as my treatment began I started feeling better slowly slowly. As compared to the past treatments I was feeling far better. Now, to be very Frank I'm feeling so nice as my treatment was done well. I used to be upset in recent years but now all sadness is gone and I'm better. Furthermore, I feel so good to meet her. She always understands my problem that is why. 
Now, I don't have any tension regarding my problem because DR. Karishma Thariani is there to get me out of any matter of concern related to my disease. 

I would recommend to every patient( suffering from the same ) to meet DR. Karishma Mam.

Thank you a lot DR. Karishma Mam
Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother underwent treatment under Dr Karishma Thariani for pelvic prolapse. From the very first meeting we got convinced that we are with the right doctor. Dr Thariani was very patient, focused and shared every minute detail keeping us very well informed of all the procedures throughout. Within a month all the issues were resolved and my mom's back to her normal working self.It had been a wonderful experience with Dr Karishma who is not just a noteworthy doctor but an amazing person too with her humane roots intact.Thanks and regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Karishma Thariani is one of those doctors who really listens to your concerns. She doesn’t suggest you a bunch of medicines in one go without knowing your illness journey - since when you’ve felt it and what all you’ve been doing to treat it so far. I went to so many doctors for my UTI but I never got a valid explanation of why my urine culture always came back negative after I had been diagnosed with a UTI.  She instead told why I was feeling the symptoms I was feeling. Even when I visited her in person, she was extremely calm and polite with me and made the whole experience extremely relaxing. She was able to assess my concern quickly which prevented me from making multiple trips. Her staff is tremendously helpful and very quick to send reports and respond online.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr karishma for vaginal infection as I consulted many doctors before that and I was not happy with the treatment. Everyone was putting me on antibiotics until I met Dr. Karishma. First she took an hour to understand my problem. She examined me throughout and she started my treatment. I started feeling better after that. I really want to say, if anyone who is suffering from vaginal, urinal infection they must visit Dr karishma without giving a second thought. I consulted 3 doctors before consulting her and I am doing fine today. She is calm *** *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ***** I will always be thankful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Gynae advice,Urinary Tract Infection,Uro-gynecological surgeries,Urinary Incontinence (Ui) Treatment,
review: my mom was suffering from some UTI and bladder issues from so many years and consulted God knows how many doctors. But no doctor could find out the actual cause behind this. She is the only one who detected the actual problem and gave treatment for same. Really really thankful to her for my mom. My mom who wasn't able to control her urine even for 5 mixtures, can hold it for 45 minutes to 1 hours and infact sometimes more. and all this is because of her treatment. thank you doctor. Ps: I love her more for friendly nature.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went with issues regarding urinary in continence and forced urinary action along with leakage, issue which are a hard yo discuss with every Dr.
I wish to thank Dr Karishma for her excellent approach which are based on hearing patiently to ones problems,mentally preparing for the procedure and a highly professional systematic treatment with proper explanation.

She was able to gauge the larger problem related to bladder inflammation , IBS even without me being able to suitably explain her, all stand as testimony to her skills and mastery of her craft. I again thanks her alot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr karishma in August 2020 when I was going through very tough time with severe pain in my lower abdomen and burning sensation while passing urine. I had been facing this problem since 2017 and had lot of antibiotics. Doctors only diagnosed this problem as UTI but Dr karishma immediately understood the real problem and explained every step of the treatment to me. She was available all the time on text or call. She is indeed very empathetic and supportive towards her patients. I am happy to say that my long term problem was solved by the treatment she prescribed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had Urinary Incontinence Problem since last 10 years. I consulted Dr Karishma Thariani in August 2020 & was highly impressed by her knowledge & in depth explanation of the problem & it's solution. Finally I underwent surgery in November 2020. And now the problem of stress urinary incontinence is 0 %. I would like to thank Dr Karishma Thariani for her efforts & dedication with which she attends her patients. Finally I would highly recommend Dr Karishma Thariani to anyone having Urinary Incontinence Problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Having been suffering from chronic UTI for about 4 years and having exhausted all my energies visiting numerous gynaecologists & urologists, I had almost given up. Urine cultures used to suggest multi drug resistance and so I would be administered intravenous antibiotics almost every month. It was finally a visit to Dr Karishma Thariani that started doing the wonders. The entire concept of treating patients like me was totally different from the so called run of the mill types. The fact that she gives you an extremely patient hearing speaks volumes about her personality and comforts the patient even before the actual treatment starts. Extremely thorough in her field and totally abreast with the various ailments, visiting her has so far been a life changing experience for me. One amongst a handful of Urogynaecologists in the country, I sincerely fall short of words expressing her caliber and my gratitude & contentment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Urinary Tract Infection (Uti),Pregnancy care and management,
review: It was the first time I took the appointment from practo to consult Dr. Karishma regarding my urinary tract infection, as I spoke to her about my problem, she listened and gave enough time to tell her exactly what I was going thru, her line of treatment and how to prevent it in future,her assuring way of dealing with my problem, made me more than satisfied and i was ok within a few days.Second time I contacted her regarding Pregnancy care n management for my daughter in law , Dr. Karishma was like a saviour for her in time of this corona Panademic and satisfied her of all her queries and how to proceed further.Thanks doc, u all are warriors and saviours , salute to all n you.ThanksRenuka

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I’ve been visiting Dr. Karishma Thariani for 3 years now. Found her after searching for doctors for months who specialise in this field. At my lowest point with debilitating bladder pain she helped me get my life back after being diagnosed with Interstitial Cystitis. She has a very strong expertise in her field of urogynecology with a holistic approach, but most of all she’s empathetic, helped me make sense of my diagnosis, took her time going through my treatment plan with me, helped me take DNA tests at my request, treated me for months, was available to take my calls when my pain got unbearable, always encouraged me that I would get back to normal even when I thought I wouldn’t. I had visited other doctors before I found her, but She was the only doctor I could find in Delhi NCR, who truly understood the mental and physical toll it had on patients and treats patients with empathy, compassion and provides mental support which truly helped considering how difficult it is to diagnose and treat such conditions. Now that I’m better I have Dr. Karishma and her team Nurse Kavitha, assistant Jyoti to thank for the excellent treatment and care they continue to provide me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i would give her negative review if practo allowed to do so. 1. Her fee is exorbitant.2. Extremely rude, bad behaviour3. Now my story. She saw my UTI culture report *** ******* ********** *** ****** *** ***** *** ***** **** ** ********* ***** ******** ***** ** *** ***** ********** ********* ** **** Her assistant took me inside and asked me to pee. i said doctor will take my urine sample. she said no you have to pee in the washroom. i came back. now doctor is saying you should not have peed, my assistant was wrong. *** ***** ** **** ****** ******** **** *** **** * **** ** **** *** ***** ****** ** *** ***** *** **** ******* she inserted catheter which was so painful. then to my surprise said, fine go and give urine to some other lab as your sample is not enough. ****** *** **** ******* ** * **** ***** ****** ***** ** ** ****** ** * ************ **** ** *** ********** *** ** **** **** ***** ******* **** * **** ****** ** *** *** ***** ** ****** ********* **** * ** ******** *** ******** ********* ******* ******* ** ********** * *** ******* ***** *** **** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from frequent urination and pain in bladder region. I consulted so many doctors and no doctor could find out the actual cause behind this. My mental health was also affected because of this condition. Then I visited Dr. Karishma ma'am in June 2022. She listened my problem and for proper diagnosis she did a cystoscopy to confirm my condition. I was diagnosed with interstitial cystitis. Then she started my treatment which include bladder installation, physiotherapy ( pelvic floor) , diet and oral medication. After taking treatment my condition started getting better. At present I am in good condition. My life is back on track. Dr. Karishma ma'am is very humble, cooperative and caring person. If anyone has bladder related issue I would highly recommend them to consult Dr. Karishma.
Thank you ma'am.

review: I got to know about Dr. Karishma from Practo.After my first vaginal birth I developed a problem of Faecal inconvenience which is very rare. I was very depressed because I had multiple episodes of leakages in a day and was always in worry that how will I go out with this problem. I visited her and she explained me the whole issue she suggested me physiotherapy as I was 27 years of age that time she told me that at my age surgery will not be a better option.Now, I had my second baby through c section and it's almost 2 years since I received my physiotherapy and I am almost 90% recovered from the problem**** ** *** **** ** *** *** **** ** * *** **** *** ** ** ********** ***** ***

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had been suffering from urinary incontinence for several years, and after menopause the condition gradually become very severe. I had tried various doctors and physiotherapists, to no avail. Finally I met with Dr. Karishma Thariani a few months ago, who not only fixed my problem for me, but is also providing ongoing support to ensure the problem doesn't occur again, in the future.
Not only is Dr. Thariani an extremely competent urogynaecologist, but I can vouch from my own personal experience that she is a doctor who is more concerned about her patient's well being than even the patient herself! Her sincerity and dedication to her profession and the patients under her care are truly exemplary.
I have no hesitation at all in recommending Dr. Karishma Thariani to anyone looking for the right doctor for the  treatment of urogynae problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother a 68 year old lady was suffering from episodes of post menopausal bleeding. We went to many gynaecologists and were advised lots of tests and told about the possibility of cancer which scared us. We then met dr Karishma, who explained us everything in detail and in a calm way. She advised hysteroscopy with endometrial biopsy for my mother. She made my mother extremely comfortable during the visit and also during the procedure. We are grateful to her for her patience and care which is often found lacking in most practitioners.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were referred to the doctor be a friend. We were amazed that the doctor spent 60 minutes with us in the first meeting to understand my entire medical history, do a through physical examination and answer all our questions. Doctor has a very friendly manner and patiently listens to all problems and provide solutions. Would recommend Dr. Karishma for a family member.  She is so much better than other doctors who charge less money and will meet for only 10-15 min and not understand issue and provide any standard medical advice.

Now we are happily living. Dr Karisma is so much friendly and understand the real problem and psychological status of her patient and treat them accordingly. In our condition beside a doctor she was like a friend. Dr Karishma is like a goddess for us and we strongly recommend everyone to visit her if someone facing same issue.

review:
Hello all
Want to share my experience with dr. Karishma Mam.
Firstly i m very thankfull to her from d bottom of my heart.
Suffering from pain in lower abdomen from last one yr.
 Before visiting her i consulted so many doctors and they all keep on changing medicines but my problem remains same.
My life turning point came when i met dr Karishma.  She diagnosed disease named bladder pain syndrome now after treatment  i m in much better condition though disease is chronic. 
So I urge everyone if anyone is facing problem related to pelvic area ,lower abdomen , urine reated or UTI dont i indulge ur time and money by visiting multiple doctors.** ******** *** ** ****** ** **** *****. Moreover she is too humble and compassionate .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Karishma is a highly competent medical professional with a rare specialization in  urogynaecology. I went to her with a complex problem and in an anxious state of mind, She put me at ease and gave me treatment as well as mental confidence. Her attention to detail, generosity with time and her desire to listen to each detail of the ailment are admirable qualities. Its a long period of treatment for such problems but guided by such a doctor, health improves dramatically. Her patience and expertise are laudable. Thankyou Dr. Karishma for the human touch to medical consultations.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was a very reassuring experience as the doctor was extremely patient. She had me fill a detailed form beforehand that actually addressed issues that I have learnt to manage and did not think of it as an immediate issue. But we women learn to suppress many of our ailments and the form not only had me respond to it, but the doctor took it up on her own and explained everything. In fact a lot of my peripheral concerns were addressed along with my pressing health issues. I am extremely glad I consulted her and I will take her up as my go-to-gynaecologist. Thank you Dr. Thariani.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ******** ** * **** **** ******* On my first visit itself i was reassured that i was going to be fine. Also, every other doctor told me that i had no issues abd i was doing fine. She was the first doctor who diagnosed my problem and told me its interstial cystitis. I was so relieved that atleast now i know what i am suffering from and form thereon i started the treatment. 3 minths into it and now i can say the treatment is 100% effective . *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ********* ** ****** *** ********* *** ********* ** ** ***** *** i cant recommend her enough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After searching everywhere for urogynecologists for months I finally found Dr. Karishma Thariani, out of all the gynaecologists I’ve visited in Delhi and Noida she was the only person who spent time in actually trying to understand the history of my illness, very friendly, very systematic and detailed, took her time out to listen to me, never missed any detail, explained every bit of her diagnosis to layman terms. 
I felt relieved just knowing that I finally found a doctor who’s actually interested in finding a solution to treat me. 
The staff were friendly, it’s very private and less crowded compared to other hospital chains.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** **************** ** * **** ******* I was suffering heavy bleeding since 2014. I went two three gynecologists, and took d&c 2 times. doctors told  my Utres is bulky and entrometrium thickness is 18mm. Every month I was suffering  this problem and had taken many medicines, doctor's  advised to remove the utres. Finally in 2019 August I meat Dr. karishma, and with her treatment went d&c with marina insertions.  Since after 7 months with utres now I am   perfectly good.  If you have such type of problem,  i suggest you to meet dr.Karishma.
